rows.label: qst711401_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, have you ever noticed all
the guff washing up ashore?

rows.label: qst711401_msg0002
rows.name:
Machine parts and what have you.
Happens a lot in Gula and in Iira.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm an adventurer, by the
by. I travel round Alst
searching for the stuff.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0004
rows.name:
You see, to the untrained eye,
they just look like scrap, but
there's plenty of value inside.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0005
rows.name:
To get to it, though, you
need a tool called a Seeker,
designed by top engineers.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0006
rows.name:
But I think my Seeker's
broken or something.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0007
rows.name:
I was planning on using it to pick up
lots of parts all over Gula, but looks
like that won't be happening now.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0008
rows.name:
I don't just want to wait around
twiddling my thumbs here, though...

rows.label: qst711401_msg0009
rows.name:
Maybe you can go instead of me?
Try and collect some machine parts
for me? What do you think?

rows.label: qst711401_msg0010
rows.name:
I don't mean to be nosy,
but you're a tough bunch,
right? Drivers, Blades?

rows.label: qst711401_msg0011
rows.name:
Well, searching in
monster-infested places
should be right up your street!

rows.label: qst711401_msg0012
rows.name:
The look on your faces
tells me you're interested.
Great, that settles it!

rows.label: qst711401_msg0013
rows.name:
So, first of all, you'll have
to build a Silver Seeker.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0014
rows.name:
Once you've got one of those,
you'll be able to retrieve the
useful parts from the scrap.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0015
rows.name:
To make a Silver Seeker, you'll need
a Krabble Carapace, which you can get
at the Serene Springside nearby.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0016
rows.name:
Once you have a Seeker, you can use
it to recover useful parts from the
washed-up machines you find.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0017
rows.name:
Currently I'm after one Bat
Hinge and a Scarlet Coil.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0018
rows.name:
There are plenty of "silver
machine parts" all over Gula,
so I'd like you look for those.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0019
rows.name:
I'll be here waiting for
you, don't you worry!
